TopicTitle: Just a little animation I did

Articles.Content:
So I've been looking at dv maps on the forums and web and some of them are not intuitive. Here is the start of a dv map everyone should be able to understand.

WMV movie format (300kb - use 'save as' if browser fails):

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/80858415/hosted/dvtoorbit.wmv

Animated gif without text:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/80858415/hosted/dvtoorbit.gif
